column1: 9$Schizophrenia$10/31/2018 11:09:41 PM$Reviewer: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $1$1$1$I only took one dose and soon after had akathisia and difficult breathing and talking.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Caregiver) $5$4$5$My husband has Paranoid schizophrenia.  He has been taking Saphris since October.  It is like a miracle drug for him.  He has gained a little weight but the trade off is worth it.  He is able to go in public without me and volunteer at church.  He is developing friendships of his own.  He still hallucinates a bit but not like before.  I have my husband back.
19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $2$1$1$First off
column3: this tastes HORRIBLE. Worse than the one time I got gasoline in my mouth. Aside from that
column4: the effect on my mood after 3 weeks was awful. I was constantly angry and combative. I do not like this medication at all and will be switched to something else at the soonest possible time.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $4$3$4$great experince

45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$4$4$Saphris has finally given me a life without feeling no emotions inside. I have only been on it for about 5 weeks. I just hope I continue to feel this way. I Have been in such a bad way for many years and on every drug out out there. I was thinking if this doesn't work im going to jump
column3: well here iam building my life

column2: 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$4$4$I had been stuck on Zyprexa and had gained almost a hundred pounds. Immediately after I started the Saphris
column3: my weight started dropping. I am fine as far as curbing the psychotic tendencies and have now lost 30 pounds! Am a little worried about the attack on white blood cells
column4: but am having that monitored. Thank you Dr. Dolgoff!

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $5$5$5$Saphris has kept me sane for 18 months. I sleep well and like the Black Cherry flavor. I am taking 30 mg a day. Nothing else worked as well.
35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $3$1$1$The taste
column3: it left bad taste in my mouth and it was hard to get by the taste and not being able to eat much as well
column4: it made my whole taste buds go ......I couldnt get paste the taste
column5: it made me want to up chuck.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Caregiver) $2$1$1$not great my daughter never remembers ti take it still talks to her self does not care how she looks does noyhing for herself

25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $4$4$4$Be careful this stuff is strong! It makes me extremely tired about 30 min after I take it at night until morning.I eat or drink the next morning and it wears off quickly.It is the only antipsychotic ive tried that I can function as well the next day without being tired most of the time.Hopefully I can take it only once a day at night because it is strong at this point and it would be hard to function taking it twice a day.I think they should make a lower dose to start people out on in case they are allergic or extra sensitive to saphris or even antipsychotics.Doctors should be extra careful with this medicine but for me it has been the best one.

35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $1$1$1$"Saphris didn't really stop voices completely I had some relief but maybe because it made me pass out for 8 hours which it took hold of my sleep mechanism and since I been off it a few months I cant go to sleep on my own

column1: I cant seem to get a hold of my Dr  so I don't sleep  my sleep is ruined from saphris  I went to sleep fine before I was put on saphris a little over a year ago  I did many things too that now sit in the corner and collect dust while I sit and try to connect my incomplete thoughts that were complete back then too  my timing is slightly off
and and my tuning is bad and it was saphris
and I been wasting for it to let up and it seems to be permanent..."

column2: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $5$5$5$Saphris has helped me tremendously. For years i was treated with risperdal
column4: haladol and others and nothing worked. Within days of starting Saphris my symptoms drastically reduced. I function normally now with very few episodes of voices. My only complaint is the taste of the stuff but i can live with it.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $5$5$5$
35-44 on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $1$1$1$I just started taking the medicine and it leaves a bad after taste in my mouth is that normal
45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $4$5$5$I started Saphris after unsuccessful on seroquel
column5: risperdal. Results are great for me so far. Benefits include no more suspicious odors of harmful impact. Side effects are very low.  My motivation level is through the roof
column6: it is not really restlessness and it is not really akathisia. I don't have anxiety any more like I did on the other meds. I have to take trazadoone for sleep since saphris interferes with my sleep.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $3$4$4$i have noticed that i feel much calamer and still efectively and reaming that way i can tell the difrance
35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver) $3$3$5$"My 21yr old daughter just started this med a couple days ago. First & second doses seemed to agree with her. Third dose
column3: she suddenly was having difficulty standing
column5: and had some muscle weakness. I do know that this med is making her sleepy
column7: but she needs to take it during the day as well. Wonder if these ""side effects"" will go away with a little time. She also has a history of seizures
column8: but she has not had any since starting Saphris. My daughter would say that she was hearing voices
column9: but hasn't mentioned the voices since she started on this med. However
column10: it may be too soon to tell if Saphris made those voices go away for good. "

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$5$5$I LOVE this medication in 10 min my aggitation is gone and im awake and alert. I know alot of people said it makes them tired but it wires me up which I love because im not all drugged and hungover like from seroquel
19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $2$3$4$makes me very sleepy to the point where I am non functioning
25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$5$5$Though it doesnt taste good
column3: it works wonders. In a week my hallucinations have decreased and nearly gone. By far this is the best medication ive been on in addition to my other medications. I strongly reccommend this medincine.

column1: 137$Schizophrenia$4/21/2011 11:34:36 AM$Reviewer: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $4$4$4$After taking Seroquel for years
column2: Saphris gave me a new lease on life!  Wow
column3: I wake up in the AM well rested and alert
column4: not groggy and wanting to stay in bed all day like with Seroquel.  I had some trouble waking up too early but switching my depression med (nortriptyline) to the evening and adding a little more benzo's is working very well and I've been sleeping 7 to 8 hours a night.  Seroquel had me way overweight but with Saphris I'm loosing weight.  The first 3 days I lost 10lbs. probably all water
column5: but since then I'm still loosing about a pound a week a total of 18 pounds so far.  I still have food cravings like with Seroquel
column6: but not as bad.  I seem to be overeating less than before and can stop eating when I'm full.

column1: 153$Schizophrenia$1/24/2011 2:09:37 AM$Reviewer:  Female  (Caregiver) $1$1$1$Be very careful with this medication. My daughter started this medication and had to go to the ER that night because she passed out and we could not get a heart beat on her. I will never allow her to use this again. I hope it was an allergic reaction only
column2: but recomend caution to anyone starting this med. Have a family member close by.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$5$5$"I HAVE SCHIZO AFFECTIVE DISORDER WITH DUAL PERSONALITIES. I AM ON SEVERAL DIFFERENT MEDS
column3: INCLUDING SAPHRIS SL 10MG. IN THE MORNINGS & 10MG. @ NIGHT. OUT OF ALL THE MEDS I AM ON THIS MED IS THE BEST FOR THE VOICES.

column2: I GET THE KNUMBNESS UNDER THE TOUNGE BUT
column3: THAT IS NOTHING COMPAIRED TO THE EFFECT IT HAS ON MY HEARING VOICES ALL DAY. I DON'T HEAR THE VOICES AS MUCH NOW AFTER TAKING SAPHRIS.

column1: I HAVE BEEN ON MANY MANY DIFFERENT DRUGS/MEDS FOR OVER TWENTY YEARS
column2: AND NONE HAS WORKED AS WELL AS SAPHRIS SL
column3: I LIKE THE BLACK CHERRY FLAVOR IT BEATS THE ORIGINAL FLAVOR BY A LANDSLIDE."

column2: 25-34 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $3$1$3$I took this because it has no weight gain and I was happy with losing weight because of it. The cons bad tasting and having too wait ten minutes to eat or drink.Here is where it went bad.I had OCD when I was a child and it went away
column3: but it all started off with getting my car modified and I was not happy with the job and decided to start fixing my car and was angry
column4: then my friends and family told me leave your car alone. It became an obsession working on my car. I ended up ruining my car and I tried fixing it
column5: but things kept getting worse. OK now I will get to the point
column6: this medicine gave me obsessive compulsive disorder bad and made me an angry person. I now have a bill worth 2 grand to have my car fix because I can't control obsession when I am on this med. I quit it and started crying for the first time in 8 months because I hurt my car.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$5$5$"I herd voice and seen things scene I was a kid and now with this I have a new live.
